original_title: The Man with the Smallest Penis in Existence and the Electron Microscope Technician Who Loved Him
overview: Mild-mannered Chester Gaylord trudges through life with a painful sexual handicap. He goes for a magical colonoscopy where he meets a woman with a microscope who changes his life.
title: The Man with the Smallest Penis in Existence and the Electron Microscope Technician Who Loved Him
